question: You are planning a tour with your family to a tourist destination. Write a letter to a hotel manager asking about the availability of accommodation for the days you will be here and also tell him what type of room you prefer.
text: My name is Kajol Dave. I am writing to inquire about staying at your hotel with my family during our tour to that place. My family consists of my father, my aunt and uncle, and me. We will arrive on the 1st of June and want to stay till 15th June, that is we will stay 5 nights.

We would prefer a double bedroom with a balcony to seat and spend the time at night. Would you please contact me as soon as possible with the details of charges regarding this? I would also like to know about the nearest sightseeing places and how we can visit those sites.
I would be grateful if you can advise about the games, parties and other activities that can engage my family when we are not sightseeing? Please contact me at the earliest with the details of rates.
I look forward to hearing from you.
